translation.en: [Mia] What would you do if, for the last seven months,
translation.de: Was würdest du tun, wenn dein Leben sieben Monate nur aus Mauern bestanden hätte?

translation.en: your life had been made of walls?
translation.de: wenn dein Leben sieben Monate nur aus Mauern bestanden hätte?

translation.en: [Mia] Every morsel you eat had been monitored
and every pound of weight you put on, charted.
translation.de: jedes Pfund mehr notiert worden wäre?

translation.en: And now, all you have to do to get out
translation.de: Wenn du dich, um rauszukommen, für die nächsten fünf Minuten

translation.en: is not be crazy for the next five minutes.
[Mia] Could you do that?
Tick-tock.
Tock.
[faintly] Mia?
Dr. Nell asked if you were listening. I am.
translation.de: -Dr. Nell fragt, ob du zugehört hast. -Tue ich.

translation.en: I have been, yeah.
Wonderful. Uh, well, we've been through your discharge papers.
That's sorted.
And Dr. Olsen has briefed you on your medication?
translation.de: Hat Dr. Olsen deine Medikamente mit dir besprochen?

translation.en: -She did. Yes. Very thorough. -[Dr. Nell] That's what we like.
I've sent the prescriptions through to the pharmacy, so Dad, if you want to pick it up,
translation.de: Die Apotheke hat die Rezepte bereits. Dad, Sie können sie abholen.

translation.en: and Mia, why don't you head up to the dormitory and gather your things?
translation.de: Und Mia, wieso holst du nicht deine Sachen aus deinem Zimmer?

translation.en: Meems, you good?
Yeah. Almost done.
[Dr. Nell] Now, in terms of your daily schedule and routine,
translation.de: Was deinen Tagesablauf und deine Routine anbelangt,

translation.en: we've spoken to your school
and teachers and lunch staff will be on hand to help during the day.
translation.de: Das Kollegium und die Leute in der Kantine werden dir tagsüber zur Seite stehen.

translation.en: And, at home, as far as the meal plan goes, same routine as here.
translation.de: Und zu Hause folgt dein Essensplan derselben Routine wie hier.

translation.en: And, Mia, a big part of this has to come from you.
translation.de: Und Mia, ein Großteil wird von dir abhängen.

translation.en: Knowing your own body, respecting the recovery plan.
translation.de: Hör auf deinen Körper, halte dich an den Genesungsplan.

translation.en: We're still in an adjustment period.
translation.de: Wir sind noch in der Eingewöhnungszeit.

translation.en: [Mia] Get ready to lie…
So you will take it easy to begin with?
translation.de: Lass es daher bitte langsam angehen.

translation.en: [Mia] Now.
Yeah.
Nice.
Good. Then you can shoot off.
[Mia sighs] Home.
[Mia] They say you never remember the smell of home until you've spent some time away.
translation.de: Den Geruch von Zuhause kennt man erst, wenn man eine Weile weg war, heißt es.

translation.en: Well, turns out home is bigger than I thought.
translation.de: Scheinbar ist mein Zuhause größer als gedacht.

translation.en: This car is home.
London is home.
Home is here.
Home is my dad.
How are you feeling?
Fine.
Back there you had a team of specialists to cater to everything.
translation.de: Dort hattest du Spezialisten zur Hand.

translation.en: -Out here you've just got little old me. -And little old Prozac.
There is always little old Prozac.
And teachers, and friends.
And Mum.
She did really want to be there today.
How's Alex?
Fine. Yeah, fine.
He's really looking forward to having you home.
translation.de: Er freut sich schon sehr auf dich.

translation.en: Yeah. Well, for now I just want to lie down in my own bed and be by my lonesome.
translation.de: Ok, aber erst mal will ich einfach auf meinem Bett liegen und allein sein.

translation.en: Yeah.
Yep, yep, yep. You would want that, wouldn't you?
translation.de: Ja, das ist nur natürlich, was?

translation.en: -Just a few family… -Dad. …and neighbors, and Mrs. McGinty.
translation.de: Nur ein paar Familien, Nachbarn und Mrs. McGinty.

translation.en: Dad!
Oh, I thought
that you might want to see everyone.
-Oh, Jesus fuck, Rick! -We've all really missed you.
translation.de: -Ach, Scheiße, Rick! -Wir haben dich alle vermisst.

translation.en: So, I'm being thrown a party for having flown the cuckoo's nest?
translation.de: Eine Party, weil ich dem Kuckucksnest entflog?

translation.en: -It's fine, fine, fine. -What're you doing?
-I am calling them, telling them to leave. -Wait. No. Fuck. Don't do that.
translation.de: -Ich sage ihnen, sie sollen wieder gehen. -Warte, nein.

translation.en: -But you just said-- -It's fine.
-You sure? -Mm-hmm.
[Rick groaning] I'm an idiot!
translation.de: Ach, ich bin so ein Idiot.

translation.en: [Rick] Please try and act surprised.
[all] Surprise! Surprise!
Oh my God, you guys, you shouldn't have!
translation.de: Oh mein Gott, Leute, das war doch nicht nötig.

translation.en: [Mia] Fucking nailed that.
-Aw… -[Mia] Gran.
We couldn't resist, cherub.
-It's lovely to see you too. -Oh, you look so wonderful.
translation.de: -Schön, dich zu sehen. -Du siehst toll aus.

translation.en: So healthy.
[Mia] Ugh. That word.
Thanks.
Heya.
[Mia] Jesus, hi.
I tried to talk them out of it, believe me.
translation.de: Ich wollte es ihnen ausreden, ehrlich.

translation.en: [woman] Where's my girl?
Oh my God.
Awkward hug incoming.
Darling, sweetheart. I'm so sorry I'm late.
The airport was absolutely horrendous…
translation.de: Am Flughafen war die Hölle los…

translation.en: [Mia] Or no hug. Yep, that's definitely worse.
translation.de: Oder keine Umarmung. Ja, das ist schlimmer.

translation.en: Was everything alright with Dr. Nell?
translation.de: Lief mit Dr. Nell alles gut?

translation.en: [clicks tongue] All fine. Better than fine.
Oh, you are a star. I'm so sorry I couldn't be more help.
translation.de: Du bist ein Held. Verzeih, dass ich nicht mehr helfen konnte.

translation.en: [Mia] More?
You're here now.
[Gran] Mia?
A slice for the girl of the hour.
[Mia] You've got to be fucking kidding me.
[Gran] I made coconut sponge. Your favorite.
translation.de: Ich habe Kokoskuchen gebacken, deinen Lieblingskuchen.

translation.en: -I'll just be a minute. -Sweetheart, you--
Overall, could have gone better.
[Mia] Okay, Mia, name five things you can see.
translation.de: Ok, Mia, zähl fünf Dinge auf, die du sehen kannst.

translation.en: Loo roll.
Toilet brush.
Hand cream.
Soap.
Mirror.
Get your shit together, Mia. It's just cake.
translation.de: Reiß dich zusammen, Mia. Es ist nur ein Kuchen.

translation.en: You can't go back there.
[Rick] She's not having bloody cake.
[Gran] But she looks so healthy.
translation.de: Aber sie sieht so gesund aus.

translation.en: [Rick] She has an issue with food.
translation.de: Sie hat Probleme mit dem Essen.

translation.en: [softly] Healthy.
[Gran] They wouldn't have let her out if she wasn't better.
-You don't know… -She is okay.
Um… It does look delicious,
translation.de: -Ihr geht's gut. Sie… -Hört mal. Der sieht köstlich aus,

translation.en: but I think I might take a rain check. Uh…
The medication. I just feel a bit off.
translation.de: Die Pillen. Ich bin etwas neben der Spur.

translation.en: Of course, darling.
Thank you, Gran.
Why not go and have a lie down?
translation.de: Wieso legst du dich nicht hin?

translation.en: Relax for a bit.
-[Mia's mum] Yeah. -[Gran] Yeah.
[Mia] If you drop a glass and it breaks, you can always glue it back together.
translation.de: Wenn man ein Glas zerbricht, kann man es wieder zusammenkleben.

translation.en: But if you drop it again and again and again,
translation.de: Doch zerbricht man es wieder und wieder und wieder,

translation.en: eventually, it's going to be more glue than glass.
translation.de: besteht es irgendwann mehr aus Kleber als aus Glas.

translation.en: I wonder which I am now?
I used to write these lists every day.
Everything I ate down to the mouthful.
translation.de: Über alles, was ich aß, jeden Bissen.

translation.en: I thought they were helping me, drowning out the bad thoughts.
translation.de: Ich dachte, es würde mir helfen, negative Gedanken zu ersticken.

translation.en: I didn't realize they were drowning out the good as well.
translation.de: Aber es erstickte auch die positiven.

translation.en: All the everyday beauty I forgot how to see.
translation.de: Ich wurde blind gegenüber den schönen Dingen.

translation.en: And all the things I get to rediscover now.
There she is. How are you feeling, princess?
translation.de: Da ist sie ja. Wie fühlst du dich, Prinzessin?

translation.en: Good. Excited.
That's the spirit.
Morning, all.
[Rick] Good morning.
There's some breakfast for you here.
Oh, got to dash. Meeting a new client. I'm trying to convince them lavender is the new teal.
translation.de: Keine Zeit. Neue Kundschaft. Die muss ich von Lavendel überzeugen.

translation.en: Smoothie, anyone? [Rick] Remember what Dr. Nell said? Family meals?
Yes, but I haven't got time today. Well, can you make time?
translation.de: -Ja, aber ich habe heute keine Zeit. -Kannst du dir welche nehmen?

translation.en: [Mia] Glad to see nothing's changed here.
translation.de: Hier ist also noch alles beim Alten.

translation.en: [Viv] Sorry, did you say something?
translation.de: -Hast du was gesagt? -Du solltest mit uns essen.

translation.en: [Rick] Might be nice for you to eat with us.
translation.de: -Hast du was gesagt? -Du solltest mit uns essen. Würde ich nicht arbeiten, hätten wir nichts zu essen.

translation.en: [Viv] Food doesn't get on the table if I don't work, I'm afraid.
translation.de: Würde ich nicht arbeiten, hätten wir nichts zu essen.

translation.en: Now, before you go…
[Mia] Oh great, "a little chat."
We thought it might be best to have a little chat with you.
translation.de: Wir wollten uns kurz mit dir unterhalten.

translation.en: Darling, chat? Yeah, yes. Um…
Mia. You know how much today is worth?
translation.de: Mia. Du weißt, um wie viel es heute geht.

translation.en: Flying solo for the first time in six months…
translation.de: Das erste Mal wieder allein nach sechs Monaten…

translation.en: Seven months.
We're giving you this chance to show us that you're ready.
translation.de: Du hast die Chance, zu beweisen, dass du bereit bist.

translation.en: We just want you to stay here and be happy with us.
translation.de: Wir wollen, dass du hierbleibst und glücklich bist.

translation.en: And we want you to be honest this time.
translation.de: Und diesmal wünschen wir uns Ehrlichkeit.

translation.en: I know.
So, just for emergencies…
Oh, where's my phone?
Yeah, the advice says no social media.
translation.de: Ja, von Social Media wurde uns abgeraten.

translation.en: Might as well have given me a cup and string.
Right, now that's over with, to the office with me.
translation.de: Ok, das wäre geregelt. Ich muss ins Büro.

translation.en: Cinnamon.
Thanks for holding the fort.
Bloody mental baskets, aren't they?
You're a bit Disney this morning.
translation.de: Du bist heute aber gut drauf.

translation.en: Oh, look at me, just walking in the sun. No one to tell me where to go, what to do.
translation.de: Sieh nur. Ich laufe in der Sonne, ohne dass mir jemand sagt, wohin und wozu.

translation.en: This is living, my brother.
This is…
[Mia] Oh shit.
I'll be nearby, okay?
translation.de: Ruf, wenn du mich brauchst, ok?

translation.en: My first friend.
Best friend.
Or so I thought.
-Hey, skinny. -[Mia scoffs]
What?
No. I read somewhere that you're supposed to acknowledge it. No repression and that.
translation.de: Nein, ich las, man sollte es anerkennen, nicht unterdrücken.

translation.en: You're looking taller.
Yeah, well, it's been a while.
translation.de: Ja, es ist eine Weile her.

translation.en: No kidding.
I missed you, M.
Right.
-I'm sorry. -Since when did you start smoking?
translation.de: -Es tut mir leid. -Seit wann rauchst du?

translation.en: Is that a veiled hint?
I like my lungs, they've always been on my side.
translation.de: Ich mag meine Lungen. Die haben mich nie enttäuscht.

translation.en: Look, M, can we…
Can we talk about it? About what happened.
translation.de: Können wir reden? Über das, was passiert ist.

translation.en: [girl] Oh, would you look at this vision!
translation.de: Oh, welch göttliche Gestalt ist das denn?

translation.en: [Mia] Becca, quite possibly a Mensan.
And Will, my wife.
Doth mine eyes deceive me!
Called in the cavalry.
Any longer and I might have just weed myself.
translation.de: -Ich kam fast um vor Sehnsucht. -Du hast mich vor drei Tagen besucht.

translation.en: -You literally visited me three days ago. -Oh, three miserable days.
translation.de: -Ich kam fast um vor Sehnsucht. -Du hast mich vor drei Tagen besucht. Es waren drei miserable Tage.

translation.en: [Mia] These are the greatest people of all time.
translation.de: Das sind die tollsten Menschen der Welt.

translation.en: -Too long. -Way too long.
Never again?
No promises. Never promises.
Never again. I'm all yours now.
translation.de: Nie wieder. Ich bin ganz euer.

translation.en: Let's go fuck up some shit. [laughs]
Mia, are you okay?
Yeah, yeah, I'm fine.
Uh, excuse me!
Hey, there you are. I thought you'd gone overboard.
translation.de: Hey, da bist du ja. Dachte, du seist über Bord gegangen.

translation.en: -You're good, yeah? -Oh, fuck good.
She's better than good, she's free.
translation.de: Viel besser als das, sie ist frei.

translation.en: So much to see, so much to do. I mean, where do we even start?
translation.de: So viel zu sehen und zu tun. Wo fangen wir an?

translation.en: I was thinking maybe the cinema? Or the skate park?
translation.de: Ich dachte, im Kino? Oder im Skatepark?

translation.en: Oh… [laughs] We haven't gone there in forever.
translation.de: Da waren wir schon ewig nicht mehr.

translation.en: Uh, the cinema though, we can go this Friday?
translation.de: Aber ins Kino könnten wir am Freitag?

translation.en: -Becs, this Friday we're supposed to be-- -[Will] Oh shit. Is that…
translation.de: -Becs, am Freitag ist… -Oh Scheiße. Ist das…

translation.en: Oh God, hide me.
-I told her that I moved to Cameroon. -Why? Who is she?
translation.de: -Ich bin nach Kamerun gezogen. -Wieso? Wer ist das?

translation.en: The one that wanted to role-play as Mary, Queen of Scots or the one who wanted to stick a finger up--
translation.de: Ist das die mit dem Rollenspiel oder die, die dir den Finger…

translation.en: Yes. Her.
So you had… sex with her?
Who hasn't he had sex with? That's the real question.
translation.de: Mit wem nicht? Das ist die wahre Frage.

translation.en: You can talk. At least I'm not going at it with my boss.
translation.de: Immerhin vögle ich nicht meinen Chef.

translation.en: Seriously, you guys!
What? You said no salacious gossip till she was back.
translation.de: Was? "Keine Anzüglichkeiten, bis sie zurück ist."

translation.en: She's back! Only just. She's still in recovery.
translation.de: -Sie ist zurück. -Sie muss sich noch regenerieren.

translation.en: Ah! She is recovered. Look at her.
translation.de: Sie ist regeneriert. Sieh sie dir an.

translation.en: And the only thing she's starved of right now is gossip.
translation.de: Sie ist lediglich ausgehungert nach Klatsch.

translation.en: And I will be your waiter this evening.
And excuse me, me and my boss are not just "at it."
translation.de: Und mein Chef und ich vögeln nicht nur.

translation.en: It was magical. In the store cupboard at work.
translation.de: Es war magisch. In der Vorratskammer.

translation.en: He kept giving me eyes over the cheese counter. I still get a tingle when I think about Manchego.
translation.de: Er beäugte mich über die Käsetheke hinweg. Es kribbelt, wenn ich an Manchego denke.

translation.en: Well, I'm glad I still have one respectable friend.
translation.de: Wenigstens habe ich noch eine anständige Freundin.

translation.en: Here's to our interminable virginity.
Ha-ha! She's a woman now!
What? No! You too?
-With who? -Just this guy at Reading.
translation.de: -Mit wem? -So einem Typ auf dem Reading.

translation.en: Why didn't you tell me? Wasn't worth mentioning. It was no big deal.
translation.de: -Wieso hast du nichts gesagt? -Es war keine große Sache.

translation.en: No big deal?
I'm pretty sure you compared it to… [panting] …a religious experience.
translation.de: Ich dachte, es war eine religiöse Erfahrung?

translation.en: Oh, speaking of drunken mistakes, did you hear what Steph got up to at Nick's after we left?
translation.de: Apropos: Habt ihr gehört, was sich Steph bei Nick geleistet hat?

translation.en: -[Cameron] No. -[Becca] No.
[Mia] Fuck, how can I have missed so much in seven months?
translation.de: Scheiße, wie kann ich in sieben Monaten so viel verpasst haben?

translation.en: -Hey. Bro. -All right?
-Yo. Lads! -What's up?
It's like bloody Sesame Street in here.
translation.de: Das ist wie die verdammte Sesamstraße.

translation.en: Right?
Steph! Leanne! Sarah, you gorgeous thing!
You'll get used to it.
Yo, Becs, what you sayin'?
You're mates with Jonah? But we hate Jonah.
translation.de: Du redest mit Jonah? Wir hassen Jonah.

translation.en: He has the good weed.
There are multiple weeds?
I am sorry…
that I didn't tell you about Reading. I thought with everything--
translation.de: Dass ich nichts sagte. Ich dachte, du machst…

translation.en: It's fine. I get it. You were protecting me.
translation.de: Schon gut. Ich verstehe. Du wolltest mich schützen.

translation.en: The concept of virginity is some bullshit invention of the patriarchy anyway.
translation.de: Jungfräulichkeit ist eh ein dummes, patriarchales Konzept.

translation.en: Yeah.
Come on. We're this way.
Oi. Out my chair.
Oh, of course, sorry.
Uh, move along, dickhead.
Hello!
Hello!
Welcome, everyone, on this very special morning.
[Mia] Christ. Not you too, Miss Lambert.
translation.de: Nicht Sie auch noch, Miss Lambert.

translation.en: As discussed in the last registration,
the lovely Mia Polanco is rejoining us.
translation.de: ist die reizende Mia Polanco wieder bei uns.

translation.en: So everyone, please be extra, especially welcoming.
translation.de: Also, nehmt sie bitte alle besonders herzlich wieder auf.

translation.en: -Just like we talked about. -[Mia] Perfect.
translation.de: Wie besprochen. Perfekt. Einfach nur perfekt.

translation.en: That's perfect.
In AA, one of the first things they tell you
translation.de: Bei den AA ist mit das Erste, was man lernt,

translation.en: is to avoid people, places, and things that trigger you.
translation.de: Menschen, Orte und Dinge zu meiden, die einen triggern könnten.

translation.en: This doesn't exactly help when your trigger is something
translation.de: Das hilft nur bedingt, wenn dein Trigger etwas ist,

translation.en: you literally need in order to literally live.
translation.de: was man wortwörtlich zum Überleben braucht.

translation.en: And it isn't just eating that's the problem. It's after.
translation.de: Nicht nur das Essen ist das Problem, sondern auch das danach.

translation.en: It's the aching, inside-out panic of feeling the food settle.
translation.de: Es ist die schmerzhaft aufwallende Panik, wenn man das Essen im Magen spürt.

translation.en: Every day.
Trying always to find a better reason than "because they tell me to."
translation.de: Immer auf der Suche nach einem besseren Grund als: "Weil sie es sagen."

translation.en: My name is Mia Polanco.
One moment.
There you go.
[Mia] Of course they saddle me with the Dwayne Johnson of potatoes.
translation.de: Ich kriege natürlich den Dwayne Johnson unter den Kartoffeln.

translation.en: Nope, it's fine.
Just a simple enormous potato.
translation.de: Es ist nur eine einfache Riesenkartoffel.

translation.en: [Becca] So what are we going to serve?
-Tequila? -[Will] Going to be absolutely rattled.
-Absolutely. -[Will shushing]
What are you guys talking about?
[Will] I was just saying that Yorkie is the ultimate gay chocolate bar.
translation.de: Ich sagte, Yorkie sei der perfekte Schokoriegel für Schwule.

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -Bollocks. What about Twix or Mounds Bar?
translation.de: Quatsch. Was ist mit Twix oder Mounds?

translation.en: Twix is pan, Mounds Bars are lesbian. Keep up.
And what are Skittles?
-Ooh, Skittles. -Orgy.
Mia. I didn't know you'd be back today.
translation.de: Mia. Ich wusste nicht, dass du heute zurückkommst.

translation.en: [Mia] Alison. Entirely her own adjective.
Yeah, I figured it was time to--
translation.de: Ja, ich dachte, es wäre Zeit…

translation.en: Great. Great.
Hey, guys.
-Hi, Cameron. -Hi.
So, wow. [scoffs] It's been forever. When's the last time I saw you? Like, Year 10?
translation.de: Also, wow. Es ist ewig her. Wann sah ich dich zuletzt? In der Neunten?

translation.en: I was here last year. It's been like seven months.
translation.de: Letztes Jahr. Ich war nur sieben Monate weg.

translation.en: Yeah. Ages.
So, how are you? How was it?
translation.de: Also, wie geht es dir? Wie war es?

translation.en: It was… It was fine. You know how it is.
translation.de: Es war ok. Du weißt ja, wie das ist.

translation.en: Well, no. I don't. I've never been to a mental hospital.
translation.de: Nein, tu ich nicht. Ich war noch nie in einer Psychiatrie.

translation.en: So, uh, A-levels are kicking my arse. -Alison, how are you finding them? -[Alison sighs]
translation.de: Also, das Abi macht mich fertig. Alison, wie läuft es bei dir?

translation.en: I totally bombed the first assessment in Bio
and I've never heard of any of the set texts for English.
translation.de: und die Texte für Englisch sagen mir nichts.

translation.en: -One of them is Hamlet. -I know, right? It's crazy.
So, was your room all padded and stuff?
translation.de: Also, waren deine Zimmerwände gepolstert und so?

translation.en: -Uh, no, that's not really-- -Don't get me wrong.
translation.de: -Nein, so ist es da… -Versteh mich nicht falsch.

translation.en: I totally get where you're coming from.
One summer, I literally lived off of nothing but Polo Mints.
translation.de: Ich habe mich mal einen Sommer nur von Minzbonbons ernährt.

translation.en: -Oh, I'm so sorry, that sounds-- -No, don't be.
translation.de: -Oh, tut mir leid, das klingt… -Nein, muss es nicht.

translation.en: I looked great. I wore crop tops for like two months.
translation.de: Ich sah toll aus. Ich trug zwei Monate lang Crop Tops.

translation.en: Are you going to Theo's party on Friday?
translation.de: Geht ihr Freitag zu Theos Party?

translation.en: -Why are you all being weird? -He probably didn't know to invite you.
translation.de: Was ist mit euch? -Er wusste es sicher nicht. -Es wird eh nicht gut.

translation.en: -It probably won't be that good anyway. -Oh.
translation.de: -Er wusste es sicher nicht. -Es wird eh nicht gut.

translation.en: At his last party, Will was literally like,
translation.de: Auf seiner letzten Party rief Will:

translation.en: "I've peaked. Kill me now. Life will not get better than this."
translation.de: "Tötet mich jetzt. Besser wird mein Leben nicht mehr."

translation.en: [Mia] I thought I needed to get back to the person I was before,
translation.de: Ich wollte an die Person anknüpfen, die ich mal war,

translation.en: to the things I loved,
translation.de: an die Dinge, die ich liebte,

translation.en: but they all kept moving while I stood still.
translation.de: doch sie hatten sich alle weiterentwickelt.

translation.en: Parties, drinking, drugs, sex. That's the new normal.
translation.de: Partys, Alkohol, Drogen, Sex. Das war das neue Normal.

translation.en: That's what I need to catch up on, or else I'll be left behind.
translation.de: Ich muss aufholen, um nicht auf der Strecke zu bleiben.

translation.en: I'm way more in the mood for the cinema anyway.
translation.de: Ich habe mehr Lust auf Kino.

translation.en: -Oh yeah. -Mm. Me too.
Or we could stay in, do Clueless again.
translation.de: Oder wir sehen uns Clueless an.

translation.en: Like, if… if you guys want. I don't really care.
translation.de: Falls ihr Lust habt. Mir wäre es egal.

translation.en: [Mia] A party is the perfect place to catch up.
All the birds, one stone.
Where are you going? The other side.
This is a good idea. This is a good idea.
-This is a good-- -Theo! Oh God. I'm so sorry.
translation.de: -Das ist eine gute… -Theo. Oh Gott. Tut mir so leid.

translation.en: -[Theo] That's okay. -[Mia] Sorry.
-No, that's okay. It's, um… -Hi.
[Mia] Theo. The cutest of the cute.
Mia! You're back. Oh, that's bloody ace.
translation.de: Mia. Du bist zurück. Das ist ja geil.

translation.en: Can I come on Friday? What?
To the party.
Is it, like, cool if I come?
translation.de: Ist es cool, wenn ich komme?

translation.en: Oh right.
Yeah, sure. If… you want to.
Really?
I mean, great, perfect. Um…
Is there like an invitation I need to get in, or…
translation.de: Brauche ich eine Einladung, um reinzukommen, oder…

translation.en: Uh, no, that's not really a thing.
Right. Of course.
So does that mean there won't be any party bags?

translation.en: Damn, I knew there was something I forgot.
translation.de: Mist, hab ich also doch was vergessen.

translation.en: Yeah, 'cause the ones at your fifth birthday were, like, next-level.
translation.de: Die zu deinem fünften Geburtstag waren krass gut.

translation.en: -Is that why you want the invite? -Only reason. For the Chupa Chups.
translation.de: -Willst du darum kommen? -Wegen der Chupa Chups.

translation.en: Guess I got some serious shopping to do.
translation.de: Dann muss ich wohl einkaufen gehen.

translation.en: I'll see you Friday, then.
Yeah, you will.
What the hell was that?
Just told Theo that I'd stop by the party if he was cool with it.
translation.de: Ich sagte Theo, dass ich zur Party komme, wenn das cool für ihn ist.

translation.en: And he was.
Okay, I'm loving this energy.
Are you sure this is a good idea? You just came out of the hospital.
translation.de: Ist das echt eine gute Idee? Du warst im Krankenhaus.

translation.en: Becs, I love you, but you really need to stop fussing.
translation.de: Becs, ich liebe dich, aber du musst damit aufhören.

translation.en: I'm fine.
Look, I wouldn't be here if I wasn't.
translation.de: Sonst wäre ich doch nicht hier.

translation.en: I'm going to a party with my favorite people, and I'm gonna have some fucking fun for once.
translation.de: Ich gehe mit meinen Lieblingsmenschen aus und amüsiere mich zur Ausnahme mal.

translation.en: -Who are you and where did you put Mia? -[laughing]

translation.en: ♪ You go bow for the result o Nothing to discuss o ♪ ♪ Cause I dey win by default… ♪

translation.en: [Viv] Mia! Becca is here!

translation.en: Oh! I could have stayed in that hug until uni.

translation.en: Becs!
A fucking party. An actual fucking party.

translation.en: We are going to do all the things!
-Alcohol's a given, right? -It is.
And they probably hand out drugs like Party Rings?

translation.en: Weird comparison, but yes.
But…
sex…
Whoa. Big leap.
Oh, come on. That's what parties are really about.

translation.en: That's the thing I'm missing. The thing to take me to normal.
translation.de: Das fehlt mir noch. Um normal zu sein.

translation.en: Normal ain't all it's cracked up to be. Loads of slobbery boys called Henry.
translation.de: Normal ist nicht so geil, wie du denkst. Das sind viele schmierige Henrys.

translation.en: That's where it gets murky for me. All the others you just jump in, but…

translation.en: me, I'm missing that… key.
translation.de: Aber mir fehlt der Schlüssel dazu.

translation.en: That first step.
-Becs. -Mm-hmm?
How do you kiss?
[giggling] What?
Why?
More importantly, who?
Oh, does it matter? I just… I never really learned how
translation.de: Ist das denn wichtig? Ich habe es nur nie gelernt,

translation.en: and you clearly know a hell of a lot more than I do now.
translation.de: und du weißt jetzt offensichtlich mehr als ich.

translation.en: Please! One guy, one tent. I'm hardly top shagger.

translation.en: Oh, but Scotty T. You've been there.
translation.de: Aber Scotty T, du hast es getan. Du hast die Jungfräulichkeit überwunden.

translation.en: You've seen the other side of the virgin coin. Come on.
translation.de: Aber Scotty T, du hast es getan. Du hast die Jungfräulichkeit überwunden. Komm schon. Weise mich ein.

translation.en: Tell me your ways.
Why do you need to know?
Because if I tried to kiss someone now, it'd be like when I was a kid,

translation.en: just smashing Barbie and Ken's faces together.
translation.de: das Barbies und Kens Gesichter zusammenkrachen lässt.

translation.en: I mean, I don't know what to do with my hands.

translation.en: -Or when to close my eyes. -Calm down. It's not that complicated.
translation.de: -Wann schließe ich die Augen? -So schwer ist das nicht.

translation.en: Or the tongue. I mean, what does that do?
Is it round and round like the spin cycle? Or do you sort of just…

translation.en: Ugh. What lizard are you kissing?
Don't mock me. I'm pissing stress hormones.

translation.en: Okay, come here. Kiss me, then.
See, now, imagine there's a third nose between your noses.

translation.en: What?
That's when you close your eyes. When you're nose-width apart.

translation.en: -Nose-width? -Mm-hmm.
Good. Now, bringing in the tongue.
A very good tip, if you're ever unsure what you're doing,
translation.de: Wenn du nicht weiß, was du tun sollst,

translation.en: pay attention to how the other person's kissing you

translation.en: and kiss them back the same way. Got it?

translation.en: Mm. Okay, but how-- Oh.
Good. That wasn't bad.
Pretty good for your first go.
Now, that jumper? Mm-mm, it's just wrong. A very large man wore it golfing.

translation.en: What, that's all your advice? "Pretty good" is far from perfect.

translation.en: Perfection takes 1,000 hours and, ooh, the party starts in two.

translation.en: Now, makeup, do you want to go loud or sexy?

translation.en: Yes.
Heading out now. Bye, guys!
-Thank you for having me, Mr. and Mrs. P. -Hold up.
You've had your evening snack? I had it earlier.
Oh gosh, don't you both look lovely.

translation.en: Bit dressed up for the cinema, eh?
Oh, don't be silly.
Finally rubbing off on you. Up to the nines wherever you go.

You're weird. What?

Now this, my friend, is a party.

[Mia] Holy fuck.
-This is everything. -[Will] Mia, come on.
So yeah, work was fucking weird.

Thanks.

No, no, no, no. This is just for Little Miss Mia.

Yeah.

…this massive family pickle, and it's just been a bit of a conundrum.
Oh, sorry. What did you say?
Sorry, I think I have plans.

What a classy pair we make.

-[coughing] -Okay. That's enough for you.
-[coughing] -Mm.
Who would choose to do that?
I don't think I've seen you this happy in…

Look, I am sorry I didn't visit you, okay?

That's all I'm going to apologize for because I know you're gonna hate me for it.

She's gone. She's gone!

It's never gonna be like it was, is it?

Come on.

all the shit at the back of your head,

Hey and hi.

…you fuck all the way up.

Okay.

get drunk,
